TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsPrefixAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlnsPrefixAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlnsPrefixAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別在 XAML 檔案中撰寫項目和屬性 (序列化) 時，或與具有 XAML 編輯功能的設計環境互動時，要與 XAML 用法的 XAML 命名空間關聯的建議前置詞。

span.span: Identifies a recommended prefix to associate with a XAML namespace for XAML usage, when writing elements and attributes in a XAML file (serialization) or when interacting with a design environment that has XAML editing features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 處理器或納入 XAML 或執行 XAML 序列化，任何處理程序的架構類型通常會接受建議的前置詞。XAML processors or frameworks that incorporate XAML, or any process that performs XAML serialization, should generally honor the recommended prefix. 前置詞可能需要在任何情況下在其中從原始的 XAML 來源中的特定對應的前置詞是不以某種方式在執行階段物件圖形保留或否則儲存架構或技術。The prefix might be necessary in any case where prefixes from specific mappings in the original XAML source are not somehow preserved in the runtime object graph or otherwise stored by a framework or technology. 一種架構可能會有特定的喜好設定，如何序列化自己忽略建議的前置詞，從它自己組件; 的類型這可能會為了以一致的方式升級預設 XAML 命名空間。A framework might have specific preferences for how to serialize its own types that ignore the recommended prefix from its own assemblies; this might be done to consistently promote a default XAML namespace. 不過，這類架構應該仍可能第三方和工具使用方式，其 XAML 型別提供建議的前置詞。However, such a framework should still provide recommended prefixes for possible third-party and tool usages of its XAML types. 請參閱 「 最佳做法的 XAML 設計工具支援或一般序列化 」 一節。See "Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization" section below. 前置詞的一般建議是使用短字串，因為前置詞通常會套用至所有已序列化的項目來自於 XAML 命名空間。A general recommendation for prefixes is to use short strings, because the prefix is typically applied to all serialized elements that come from the XAML namespace. 前置詞字串長度可以有明顯的影響，序列化的 XAML 輸出的大小。The prefix string length can have a noticeable effect on the size of serialized XAML output. 如果所要求的前置詞已經用於另一個先前遇到/序列化 XAML 命名空間識別項，則行為是未指定 （高達每個個別的 XAML 處理器實作是行為）。If a prefix being requested is already in use by another previously encountered/serialized XAML namespace identifier, the behavior is unspecified (behavior is up to each individual XAML processor implementation). 在大部分情況下，您套用只有當您也已套用，至少一個該相同的 XAML 命名空間的組件。In most cases, you apply only if you have also applied at least one in the assembly for that same XAML namespace. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 特定組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]， System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## XAML 設計工具支援或一般序列化的最佳作法Best Practice for XAML Designer Support or General Serialization 即使您想要在適用於您的架構或程式庫的大部分使用案例中的預設 XAML 命名空間相關聯的 XAML 命名空間，則您仍應該做為建議的前置詞的 XAML 命名空間指定為非空白字串。Even if you intend the associated XAML namespace to be the default XAML namespace in most usage cases for your framework or library, you should still specify a non-empty string as the recommended prefix for a XAML namespace. 在個別的 XAML 檔案和 XAML 節點資料流中，會執行預設 XAML 命名空間資訊。Default XAML namespace information is carried in individual XAML files and XAML node streams. 預設 XAML 命名空間，以及如何在指定的 XAML 來源中定義它可以輕鬆地會永久存在於每個案例序列化而不需使用。The default XAML namespace and how it is defined in a given XAML source can easily be perpetuated for per-case serialization without using . 不過，對於 XAML 作者已選擇將預設 XAML 命名空間對應至其他案例相當有用。However, the is useful for cases where the XAML author has chosen to map the default XAML namespace to something else. 在此案例中 XAML 文字編輯器中內嵌在設計環境可以使用做為初始的 XAML 命名空間的提示`xmlns`對應。In this scenario a XAML text editor embedded in a design environment can use as a hint for an initial XAML namespace `xmlns` mapping. 或設計環境可以將-just-in-time 對應新增至支援 XAML 的設計象徵物，例如將拖曳出 [工具箱] 並進入的視覺化設計介面的物件。Or a design environment can add just-in-time mappings to the backing XAML for design metaphors such as dragging objects out of a toolbox and into a visual design surface. 此外，就能想到了設計工具可以同時支援多個啟用 XAML 的架構，以及具有常見的 XAML 序列化程式所使用的.NET Framework XAML 服務，而不是架構特定序列化。Also, it is conceivable that a designer could simultaneously support multiple XAML-enabling frameworks, and has a common XAML serializer that relies on .NET Framework XAML Services rather than framework-specific serialization. 指定針對這些案例可協助讓 XAML 使用針對您的型別更可攜式和強大的 XAML 設計工具之間交換是否正在進行 XAML 編輯器和其他取用者，例如標記編譯器之間來回轉換或其他序列化。Specifying a for these scenarios helps make the XAML usage for your types more portable and robust if the XAML is exchanged between design tools, or undergoes a round trip between XAML editors and other consumers such as markup compilers or other serialization.
